description: KM: Create a stored procedure using ALTER
body:
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER, ANSI_NULLS ON;
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('<Schema Name, SYSNAME, dbo>.<Procedure Name, SYSNAME, BusinessEntityAction>', 'P') IS NULL
    BEGIN
        EXEC dbo.sp_executesql
            @stmt = N'CREATE PROCEDURE <Schema Name, SYSNAME, dbo>.<Procedure Name, SYSNAME, BusinessEntityAction> AS BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON; RAISERROR (''Stored procedure not defined!'', 16, 1); END';
    END;
GO

/**********************************************************************************************************************
** Description: [DESCRIPTION]
** 
** Changes:
**              Task [NNNNN: DEVOPS TITLE]
**********************************************************************************************************************/
ALTER PROCEDURE <Schema Name, SYSNAME, dbo>.<Procedure Name, SYSNAME, BusinessEntityAction> (
	/* @ParameterName AS DataType [ = DefaultValue ] */
)
/* WITH ENCRYPTION, RECOMPILE, EXECUTE AS CALLER|SELF|OWNER| 'user_name' */
AS
	BEGIN
		SET NOCOUNT, XACT_ABORT ON;
	
		$SELECTIONSTART$/* SELECT
			TableId     = TN.TableId
		   ,ColumnName1 = TN.Column1
		   ,ColumnName2 = TN.Column2
		FROM
			SchemaName.TableName AS TN
		WHERE
			TN.TableId = @TableId; */$SELECTIONEND$

	END
GO
